title: ENCODE Antibody Lot
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE Antibody (no target or validation information)

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

accession.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
accession.title: Antibody Accession

alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this one.
alternate_accessions.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
alternate_accessions.title: Alternate Accessions

description.description: A plain text description of the Antibody
description.title: Antibody Description

lab.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Lab UUID or Name
lab.title: Lab

award.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
award.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
award.title: Award Name

source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Antibody Source

lot_id.description: The vendor's id code for the antibody lot
lot_id.title: Antibody Lot ID

aliases.description: A list of product/lot aliases that also refer to this antibody-log
aliases.title: List of Antibody Lot Aliases

items.description: An antibody lot product/id alias pair
items.title: Product/Lot Alias

antigen_sequence.description: Sequence of the antigen used in raising the antibody
antigen_sequence.title: Antigen Sequence

clonality.description: Whether the antibody is mono- or poly- clonal
clonality.title: Antibody Clonality

lab_aliases.description: List of lab IDs or cross-references
lab_aliases.title: Lab Aliases

encode2_dbxrefs.description: List cross-references to the previous ENCODE2 system
encode2_dbxrefs.title: ENCODE2 DBXREFs

host_organism.comment: These are not linked, currently - this should be replace with another organism object
host_organism.title: Host Organism

isotype.description: Isotype of the antibody (IgA, IgD, etc.)
isotype.title: Antibody Isotype

purification.description: Method by which antibody was purified
purification.title: Purification Method

url.description: External URL for the specific antibody at vendor site
url.title: External URL
